title: Elegant Diamond Kada Bangles - Vanki Design
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Expertly crafted with Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine and lustre.
features: Classic Vanki design Kada bangles featuring rows of brilliant-cut CZ diamonds. The stones are set in a prong setting to maximize light reflection. A timeless design, perfect for adding a touch of South Indian elegance to any outfit. The goldwork shows expert 'Thari' (thread) design elements, creating a delicate, yet durable form.
occasions: or as a sophisticated daily wear accessory. Perfect for gifting at a Seemantham ceremony.
description: Timeless Vanki design with modern sparkle. High-quality gold with expert Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty. Cubic Zirconia offers the look of diamonds at an accessible price point. A versatile piece that blends seamlessly with both traditional and contemporary outfits.
